sentences.sContent: "We urged donors to accelerate delivery of commitments to increase aid, and for us all to consider going beyond existing commitments," they said in a communique after a meeting here.
sentences.sContent_eng: "We urged donors to accelerate delivery of commitments to increase aid, and for us all to consider going beyond existing commitments," they said in a communique after a meeting here.
sentences.sCn: "我们呼吁援助国加快实现增加援助的承诺,所有国家都应考虑在现有承诺以外扩大援助,"出席官员在华盛顿会议的公报中指出.

sentences.sContent: But, said a reporter, the communique specifically suggested just that.
sentences.sContent_eng: But, said a reporter, the communique specifically suggested just that.
sentences.sCn: 一个记者说：「可是公报说的很明确，就是那样。」
